hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
cd /home/jenkins/output/ git clone https://github.com/technexion-android/Documents.git -b android-9_imx6_imx7 cd -
cd ${HOME} mkdir -p test cd test repo init -u https://github.com/technexion-android/manifest -b tn-p9.0.0_2.2.0-ga_tn1.0 --depth 1 repo sync --force-sync -j12
########################################################### # # # PICO-IMX6 DWARF # # # ###########################################################
# hdmi source cookers/env.bash.imx6q.pico-imx6.dwarf.hdmi merge_restricted_extras
## WIFI ENABLED cp /home/jenkins/output/qca9377-3_firmware_20180927.zip . unzip qca9377-3_firmware_20180927.zip mkdir -p device/fsl/imx6dq/pico_imx6/wifi-firmware mv qca9377-3_firmware_20180927-1/QCA9377 device/fsl/imx6dq/pico_imx6/wifi-firmware/
rm -rf qca9377-3_firmware_20180927-1/ rm -rf qca9377-3_firmware_20180927.zip
## BT ENABLED cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/nvm_tlv_3.2.bin device/fsl/imx6dq/pico_imx6/bluetooth/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/rampatch_tlv_3.2.tlv device/fsl/imx6dq/pico_imx6/bluetooth/
# hdmi cook -j12
release_date=$(date "+%Y%m%d") gen_mp_images cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/Documents/txt/README.txt auto_test/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/Documents/pdf/Android-Pie_Release-Note_*.pdf auto_test/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/Documents/pdf/Android-Pie_User-Manual_*.pdf auto_test/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/Documents/pdf/PreBuilt_OS_Image_Installation_Guide_*.pdf auto_test/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/uuu_tools/imx6_imx7_tools/Win32DiskImager-0.9.5-binary.zip auto_test/ mv auto_test pico-imx6_dwarf_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_hdmi-1280x720_"$release_date" zip -r pico-imx6_dwarf_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_hdmi-1280x720_"$release_date".zip pico-imx6_dwarf_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_hdmi-1280x720_"$release_date"/ cp pico-imx6_dwarf_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_hdmi-1280x720_"$release_date".zip /home/jenkins/output/ rm -rf pico-imx6_dwarf_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_hdmi-1280x720_"$release_date"
# 7" lvds image source cookers/env.bash.imx6dl.pico-imx6.dwarf.lvds-7-inch cook -j12
release_date=$(date "+%Y%m%d") gen_mp_images cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/Documents/txt/README.txt auto_test/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/Documents/pdf/Android-Pie_Release-Note_*.pdf auto_test/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/Documents/pdf/Android-Pie_User-Manual_*.pdf auto_test/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/Documents/pdf/PreBuilt_OS_Image_Installation_Guide_*.pdf auto_test/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/uuu_tools/imx6_imx7_tools/Win32DiskImager-0.9.5-binary.zip auto_test/
mv auto_test pico-imx6_dwarf_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_lvds-1024x600_"$release_date" zip -r pico-imx6_dwarf_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_lvds-1024x600_"$release_date".zip pico-imx6_dwarf_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_lvds-1024x600_"$release_date"/ cp pico-imx6_dwarf_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_lvds-1024x600_"$release_date".zip /home/jenkins/output/ rm -rf pico-imx6_dwarf_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_lvds-1024x600_"$release_date"
sync
########################################################### # # # PICO-IMX6 NYMPH # # # ###########################################################
# hdmi source cookers/env.bash.imx6q.pico-imx6.nymph.hdmi cook -j12
release_date=$(date "+%Y%m%d") gen_mp_images cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/Documents/txt/README.txt auto_test/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/Documents/pdf/Android-Pie_Release-Note_*.pdf auto_test/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/Documents/pdf/Android-Pie_User-Manual_*.pdf auto_test/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/Documents/pdf/PreBuilt_OS_Image_Installation_Guide_*.pdf auto_test/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/uuu_tools/imx6_imx7_tools/Win32DiskImager-0.9.5-binary.zip auto_test/ mv auto_test pico-imx6_nymph_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_hdmi-1280x720_"$release_date" zip -r pico-imx6_nymph_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_hdmi-1280x720_"$release_date".zip pico-imx6_nymph_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_hdmi-1280x720_"$release_date"/ cp pico-imx6_nymph_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_hdmi-1280x720_"$release_date".zip /home/jenkins/output/ rm -rf pico-imx6_nymph_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_hdmi-1280x720_"$release_date"
# 7" lvds image source cookers/env.bash.imx6dl.pico-imx6.nymph.lvds-7-inch cook -j12
release_date=$(date "+%Y%m%d") gen_mp_images cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/Documents/txt/README.txt auto_test/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/Documents/pdf/Android-Pie_Release-Note_*.pdf auto_test/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/Documents/pdf/Android-Pie_User-Manual_*.pdf auto_test/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/Documents/pdf/PreBuilt_OS_Image_Installation_Guide_*.pdf auto_test/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/uuu_tools/imx6_imx7_tools/Win32DiskImager-0.9.5-binary.zip auto_test/ mv auto_test pico-imx6_nymph_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_lvds-1024x600_"$release_date" zip -r pico-imx6_nymph_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_lvds-1024x600_"$release_date".zip pico-imx6_nymph_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_lvds-1024x600_"$release_date"/ cp pico-imx6_nymph_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_lvds-1024x600_"$release_date".zip /home/jenkins/output/ rm -rf pico-imx6_nymph_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_lvds-1024x600_"$release_date"
sync
########################################################### # # # PICO-IMX6 HOBBIT # # # ###########################################################
# lcd-5-inch source cookers/env.bash.imx6q.pico-imx6.hobbit.lcd-5-inch cook -j12
release_date=$(date "+%Y%m%d") gen_mp_images cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/Documents/txt/README.txt auto_test/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/Documents/pdf/Android-Pie_Release-Note_*.pdf auto_test/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/Documents/pdf/Android-Pie_User-Manual_*.pdf auto_test/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/Documents/pdf/PreBuilt_OS_Image_Installation_Guide_*.pdf auto_test/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/uuu_tools/imx6_imx7_tools/Win32DiskImager-0.9.5-binary.zip auto_test/ mv auto_test pico-imx6_hobbit_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_lcd-800x480_"$release_date" zip -r pico-imx6_hobbit_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_lcd-800x480_"$release_date".zip pico-imx6_hobbit_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_lcd-800x480_"$release_date"/ cp pico-imx6_hobbit_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_lcd-800x480_"$release_date".zip /home/jenkins/output/ rm -rf pico-imx6_hobbit_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_lcd-800x480_"$release_date"
sync
########################################################### # # # PICO-IMX6 PI # # # ###########################################################
# lcd-5-inch source cookers/env.bash.imx6q.pico-imx6.pi.lcd-5-inch cook -j12
release_date=$(date "+%Y%m%d") gen_mp_images cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/Documents/txt/README.txt auto_test/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/Documents/pdf/Android-Pie_Release-Note_*.pdf auto_test/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/Documents/pdf/Android-Pie_User-Manual_*.pdf auto_test/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/Documents/pdf/PreBuilt_OS_Image_Installation_Guide_*.pdf auto_test/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/uuu_tools/imx6_imx7_tools/Win32DiskImager-0.9.5-binary.zip auto_test/ mv auto_test pico-imx6_pi_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_lcd-800x480_"$release_date" zip -r pico-imx6_pi_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_lcd-800x480_"$release_date".zip pico-imx6_pi_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_lcd-800x480_"$release_date"/ cp pico-imx6_pi_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_lcd-800x480_"$release_date".zip /home/jenkins/output/ rm -rf pico-imx6_pi_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_lcd-800x480_"$release_date"
sync
########################################################### # # # PICO-IMX7 DWARF # # # ###########################################################
# 5" lcd image source cookers/env.bash.imx7d.pico-imx7.dwarf.lcd-5-inch throw
## WIFI ENABLED cp /home/jenkins/output/qca9377-3_firmware_20180927.zip . unzip qca9377-3_firmware_20180927.zip mkdir -p device/fsl/imx7d/pico_imx7/wifi-firmware mv qca9377-3_firmware_20180927-1/QCA9377 device/fsl/imx7d/pico_imx7/wifi-firmware/
rm -rf qca9377-3_firmware_20180927-1/ rm -rf qca9377-3_firmware_20180927.zip
## BT ENABLED cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/nvm_tlv_3.2.bin device/fsl/imx7d/pico_imx7/bluetooth/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/rampatch_tlv_3.2.tlv device/fsl/imx7d/pico_imx7/bluetooth/
# 5" lcd image cook -j12
release_date=$(date "+%Y%m%d") gen_mp_images cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/Documents/txt/README.txt auto_test/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/Documents/pdf/Android-Pie_Release-Note_*.pdf auto_test/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/Documents/pdf/Android-Pie_User-Manual_*.pdf auto_test/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/Documents/pdf/PreBuilt_OS_Image_Installation_Guide_*.pdf auto_test/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/uuu_tools/imx6_imx7_tools/Win32DiskImager-0.9.5-binary.zip auto_test/ mv auto_test pico-imx7_dwarf_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_lcd-800x480_"$release_date" zip -r pico-imx7_dwarf_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_lcd-800x480_"$release_date".zip pico-imx7_dwarf_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_lcd-800x480_"$release_date"/ cp pico-imx7_dwarf_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_lcd-800x480_"$release_date".zip /home/jenkins/output/ rm -rf pico-imx7_dwarf_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_lcd-800x480_"$release_date"
sync
########################################################### # # # PICO-IMX7 NYMPH # # # ###########################################################
# vga 1024x768 image source cookers/env.bash.imx7d.pico-imx7.nymph.vga cook -j12
release_date=$(date "+%Y%m%d") gen_mp_images cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/Documents/txt/README.txt auto_test/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/Documents/pdf/Android-Pie_Release-Note_*.pdf auto_test/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/Documents/pdf/Android-Pie_User-Manual_*.pdf auto_test/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/Documents/pdf/PreBuilt_OS_Image_Installation_Guide_*.pdf auto_test/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/uuu_tools/imx6_imx7_tools/Win32DiskImager-0.9.5-binary.zip auto_test/ mv auto_test pico-imx7_nymph_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_vga-640x480_"$release_date" zip -r pico-imx7_nymph_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_vga-640x480_"$release_date".zip pico-imx7_nymph_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_vga-640x480_"$release_date"/ cp pico-imx7_nymph_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_vga-640x480_"$release_date".zip /home/jenkins/output/ rm -rf pico-imx7_nymph_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_vga-640x480_"$release_date"
sync
########################################################### # # # PICO-IMX7 HOBBIT # # # ###########################################################
# 5" lcd image source cookers/env.bash.imx7d.pico-imx7.hobbit.lcd-5-inch cook -j12
release_date=$(date "+%Y%m%d") gen_mp_images cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/Documents/txt/README.txt auto_test/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/Documents/pdf/Android-Pie_Release-Note_*.pdf auto_test/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/Documents/pdf/Android-Pie_User-Manual_*.pdf auto_test/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/Documents/pdf/PreBuilt_OS_Image_Installation_Guide_*.pdf auto_test/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/uuu_tools/imx6_imx7_tools/Win32DiskImager-0.9.5-binary.zip auto_test/ mv auto_test pico-imx7_hobbit_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_lcd-800x480_"$release_date" zip -r pico-imx7_hobbit_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_lcd-800x480_"$release_date".zip pico-imx7_hobbit_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_lcd-800x480_"$release_date"/ cp pico-imx7_hobbit_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_lcd-800x480_"$release_date".zip /home/jenkins/output/ rm -rf pico-imx7_hobbit_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_lcd-800x480_"$release_date"
sync
########################################################### # # # PICO-IMX7 PI # # # ###########################################################
# 5" lcd image source cookers/env.bash.imx7d.pico-imx7.pi.lcd-5-inch cook -j12
release_date=$(date "+%Y%m%d") gen_mp_images cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/Documents/txt/README.txt auto_test/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/Documents/pdf/Android-Pie_Release-Note_*.pdf auto_test/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/Documents/pdf/Android-Pie_User-Manual_*.pdf auto_test/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/Documents/pdf/PreBuilt_OS_Image_Installation_Guide_*.pdf auto_test/ cp -rv /home/jenkins/output/uuu_tools/imx6_imx7_tools/Win32DiskImager-0.9.5-binary.zip auto_test/ mv auto_test pico-imx7_pi_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_lcd-800x480_"$release_date" zip -r pico-imx7_pi_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_lcd-800x480_"$release_date".zip pico-imx7_pi_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_lcd-800x480_"$release_date"/ cp pico-imx7_pi_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_lcd-800x480_"$release_date".zip /home/jenkins/output/ rm -rf pico-imx7_pi_android-9.0.0-2.2.0_QCA9377_lcd-800x480_"$release_date"
sync
rm -rf /home/jenkins/output/Documents
